name: VZMacOSRestoreImage
desc: An object that describes a version of macOS to install on to a virtual machine.

items.name: var buildVersion: String
items.desc: The build version this restore image contains.

items.name: var mostFeaturefulSupportedConfiguration: VZMacOSConfigurationRequirements?
items.desc: This object represents the most fully featured configuration thatâ€™s supported by both the current host and by this restore image.

items.name: var operatingSystemVersion: OperatingSystemVersion
items.desc: The operating system version this restore image contains.

items.name: var url: URL
items.desc: The URL of this restore image.

items.name: class func fetchLatestSupported(completionHandler: (Result<VZMacOSRestoreImage, Error>) -> Void)
items.desc: Fetches the latest restore image supported by this host from the network.

items.name: class func load(from: URL, completionHandler: (Result<VZMacOSRestoreImage, Error>) -> Void)
items.desc: Load a restore image from a file on the local file system.
